attributes.action: Please raise the Issue of Plebiscite in Kashmir with India, Pakistan & UN.
attributes.additional_details:
Independent investigations must be carried out in Kashmir by United Nations to analyse the real situation.
We must raise the Issue to stop the Human Rights Violations in Kashmir. 
Please let us raise the Kashmir Issue with India and Pakistan to give right of self determination to Kashmiri People. 
Please Let us play our role, and request United Nations to implement the Plebiscite in Kashmir?
attributes.background:
India and Pakistan fought Three Wars on Kashmir Issue. 
Since 1948, Kashmir Issue is in the United Nations. Three Generations waited for the resolution of this issue for over 65 Years, and now it’s Fourth Generation suffering in Kashmir. 
Kashmir is in the state of Curfew / War since July 2016.
